user_data.target_needs: I wanted comfortable and well-fitting underwear that would provide all-day wearability without irritation.
purchase_reason: I purchased these due to the promise of comfort and softness, as well as the appeal of a tagless design. However, the sizing was completely off, and the material did not match the expectations set by the description, leading to a frustrating experience.

I was drawn to the comfort features highlighted in the description, such as the secure fit and non-binding waistband. Unfortunately, the sizing was inaccurate, and the material felt inadequate, which made the purchase disappointing.

I was looking for breathable and comfortable underwear that would suit an active lifestyle. The features mentioned, like breathable mesh panels and friction guard seams, were appealing, but the sizing issues and thin material made it a poor choice.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer clothing items that are comfortable, well-fitting, and durable. I value products that maintain their size and shape after washing, as I have experienced issues with shrinkage in the past. I appreciate classic styles that can be worn casually and are versatile enough to pair with various outfits. Additionally, I tend to favor items that offer good value for money, even if they are not the highest quality. On the other hand, I dislike products that have poor sizing, thin materials, or that do not provide the comfort they promise. I am particularly sensitive to fit issues, especially with undergarments, and I find it frustrating when items do not meet my expectations in terms of comfort and durability.

conversation.content: I want to find comfortable and well-fitting underwear that I can wear all day without any irritation. within my expected price range: [17.99, 25.54]
What fabric material do you prefer for your underwear, such as cotton, modal, bamboo, or others?
I prefer underwear made of soft and breathable materials like cotton or modal, as they tend to be more comfortable for all-day wear.
"What style of underwear do you usually find most comfortable for all-day wear, such as briefs, boxers, boxer briefs, or another style?"
I prefer boxer briefs as they provide a good balance between support and comfort for all-day wear.

The traditional fly provides support and the soft waistband will keep you comfortable in every situation.
